Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurs in the entire event log
Percentage of cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 is followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 appearing before SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that occur after SW-AE Assign Reviewers but before SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurrences in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 among all reminder-related activities (e.g., compared to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 in variants involving repeated reviewer declines (e.g., SW-Reviewer Declined occurring three or more times before agreement)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Percentage of cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 is issued but no SW-Reviewer Agreed follows within 14 days
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 events per distinct case (manuscript submission)
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that are part of variants ending in rejection (e.g., SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 relative to the total number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of variants containing Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that also contain SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late or SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Number of times Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 precedes a change in editor assignment (e.g., Assign a Different Editor or Unassign Editor)
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'Assign a Different Editor' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 that occur in the first round of reviewer assignment versus subsequent rounds (e.g., before vs. after any RW-* activity)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases where 'RW-AE Assign Reviewers' does not happen
